nodes.text: Bimmini, or Bimm, was the native language of both species of Bimms on Bimmisaari. The two species of Bimms used Bimmini as their official language. Bimmini was described as a harmonious singsong, sounding like a collection of ballads sung in five-part harmony. Most Bimms were bilingual, learning to speak and write Basic from a young age.

Notably, non-Bimm speakers of the language included Jedi Master Luminara Unduli and her Padawan Barriss Offee. The Jedi Order was highly regarded in Bimm culture, and any Jedi visiting the world was given a grand welcoming ceremony.
